name: Heroes Fight: Combat Soldiers
description:
Fight as your favorite super hero  with other super heroes  either in endless mode or progress through in training mode in this action packed game called heroes fight.

Currently, the game is being launched for Windows with more features and device support coming through.

Current set of Features:

*10 different super heroes to choose from

*5 different modes for noobs to pros

*Battle in iconic worlds

*Train to be better or head straight to fighting arena

*Cartoon effects and low violence  to make it the game fun for all ages
